Attackdex

Type: Ghost

Voyager New Moves
Voyager Updated Moves
Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Astonish 15 40 100 The user attacks the target while shouting startingly. This may also make it flinch.
Astral Barrage 5 120 100 The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.
Banshee Wail 10 90 100 The user lets loose a deafening shriek. This may cause the target to flinch.
Bitter Malice 15 75 100 The user attacks with spine-chilling resentment. It may lower Attack.
Confuse Ray 10 — 100 The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.
Curse 10 — — A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.
Desecrated Tomb 10 — — The user Protects itself. Direct contact Curses the attacker.
Destiny Bond 5 — — After using this move, if the user faints, whoever landed the knockout hit also faints.
Drag To The Void 10 80 100 The user takes the target into darkness, then damages it during the next turn.
Eerie Energy 20 70 100 The user exudes sinister energy pulses. The move's power is doubled in Eerie Fog.
Eerie Fog 10 — — The user covers the battlefield with an eerie fog that blocks protection.
Grudge 5 — 100 If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the move that knocked it out.
Hex 10 65 100 This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.
Infernal Parade 15 60 100 A myriad of fireballs inflicts a burn. Its power is doubled against statused foes.
Last Respects 10 50 100 The more defeated party members, the higher its power.
Lick 30 30 100 The target is licked with a long tongue. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
Moongeist Beam 5 100 100 The user emits a sinister ray that ignores Abilities to attack the target.
Night Shade 15 — 100 The sight of a frightening mirage inflicts damage matching the user's level.
Nightmare 15 — 100 A sleeping target sees a nightmare that damages every turn and confuses it.
Ominous Wind 5 60 100 The target is blasted with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.
Phantom Force 10 90 100 The user vanishes, then strikes the target on the next turn, even if it protects itself.
Polar Shriek 15 75 100 The user lets out a chilling shriek. This may leave the target with frostbite.
Poltergeist 5 110 90 The user attacks the target by controlling its item. The move fails if it doesn't hold one.
Psykogenic Chill 15 — 85 The user drains the target's perception of warmth. This leaves it with frostbite.
Rage Fist 10 50 100 The user attacks with rage. Its power increases the more hits the user has taken.
Seance Muse 5 — 100 Contacted spirits restore the user's HP and raise its defensive stats but Taunt it.
Shadow Ball 15 80 100 The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
Shadow Bone 10 85 100 The user beats the target with an enspirited bone. This may also lower its Defense stat.
Shadow Claw 15 70 100 The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
Shadow Force 5 120 100 The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn, even if it protects itself.
Shadow Punch 20 60 — The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.
Shadow Sneak 30 40 100 The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.
Spectral Thief 10 90 100 The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.
Spirit Shackle 10 80 100 The user stitches the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.
Spite 10 — 100 The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
Trick-or-Treat 20 — 100 The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to its type.
Wraith Wrath 10 120 100 Spirits rampage and attack for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
